main: ^You must be surprised. You don't come across message boards this dashing everyday.
^I'm BeetJuicer! The guy who made this game.
^Thank you so much for playing this little demo of mine.
^Please leave a comment on this game's page and let me know what I can do to make it better!
^If you enjoyed this demo and would like to support me, please consider donating or recommending this to your friends.
done: ^Well, well, well. Back to see this handsome face of mine again, are you?
^So? Didja tell your friends about my game yet?

c-0: ^Hmm... That's alright. You still have time to tell them. I'll wait.
c-1: ^Very good! Very good! That makes me a very happy man!
